original_text: And the servants of Absalom did unto Amnon as Absalom had commanded. Then all the king's sons arose, and every man gat him up upon his mule, and fled.
korean_text: 압살롬의 종들이 압살롬의 명령대로 암논에게 행하매 왕의 모든 아들들이 일어나 각기 노새를 타고 도망하니라

sentences.original_text: And the servants of Absalom did unto Amnon
Then all the king's sons arose
and every man gat him up upon his mule
